member.name: _DPI_HOSTING_BEHAVIOR
member.summary: Identifies the DPI hosting behavior for a window. This behavior allows windows created in the thread to host child windows with a different DPI_AWARENESS_CONTEXT

member.name: _DPI_HOSTING_BEHAVIOR.DPI_HOSTING_BEHAVIOR_INVALID
member.summary: Invalid DPI hosting behavior. This usually occurs if the previous call used an invalid parameter.

member.name: _DPI_HOSTING_BEHAVIOR.DPI_HOSTING_BEHAVIOR_DEFAULT
member.summary: Default DPI hosting behavior. The associated window behaves as normal, and cannot create or re-parent child windows with a different DPI_AWARENESS_CONTEXT.

member.name: _DPI_HOSTING_BEHAVIOR.DPI_HOSTING_BEHAVIOR_MIXED
member.summary: Mixed DPI hosting behavior. This enables the creation and re-parenting of child windows with different DPI_AWARENESS_CONTEXT. These child windows will be independently scaled by the OS.
